QuestData.Title: Sign Your Own Death Warrant
QuestData.Description:
Ember Ward only for bad buds!
<Stonehead squints at you and shakes head.>
You not look like other bad buds!
Bad buds come with bad paper!
QuestData.LogDescription: Forge official documents condemning you to the Ember Ward.
QuestData.RewardText: This bad paper look very bad...
